subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: At 80, the timber-hulled Maluka of Kermandie will again be facing a fleet of boats at least twice its size in the Sydney Hobart race, with the owner Sean Langman at the helm.
snippet: At 80, the timber-hulled Maluka of Kermandie will again be facing a fleet of boats at least twice its size in the Sydney Hobart race, with the owner Sean Langman at the helm.
